name: One More Dungeon (itch)
description:
Description

One More Dungeon is a game inspired by Zelda 2 and the Castlevania series. Explore a Dungeon, find keys, open doors and fight monsters.

Features

- 3 enemies

- 1 boss

- Game Boy style

- platformer action

Controlls

ENTER - start the game

A D - walk left and right

K - jump

SPACE - attack

W + SPACE - throw knife
